pr_title: [BEAM-9720] Add Aws Http client configurations capability.

timeline.message: Merge branch 's3ClientConfigurations' of https://github.com/Akshay-Iyangar/beam into s3ClientConfigurations
[BEAM-9720] Adding aws http client configuration capability.

timeline.bodyText: Are setClientConfiguration and getClientConfiguration still valid?
timeline.author: aromanenko-dev
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -103,6 +103,34 @@ public AWSCredentialsProvider create(PipelineOptions options) {
 
   void setClientConfiguration(ClientConfiguration clientConfiguration);

replies.bodyText: yaa they could be gotten rid of but I wasn't sure if it was a breaking change for people already using it. If you think it's ok to have only one i will change it.
replies.author: Akshay-Iyangar

replies.bodyText: Yes, you are right doesn't bring in any breaking change.
replies.author: Akshay-Iyangar

replies.bodyText: I think it would be better to keep it for now to avoid breaking change. Perhaps, just add a comment that it's recommended to use new methods since they provide more functionality.
replies.author: aromanenko-dev

replies.bodyText: Donee !! Added a note to use the newer one. 👍
replies.author: Akshay-Iyangar

timeline.message: [BEAM-9720] Adding note to use newer client configuration in AwsOptions
